short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome (or Chromium) extension that opens the new tab in a specific color

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimalist Chrome extension that replaces the New Tab page with simple colors.

Features:
- Fast loading
- Beautiful full page colors
- Unobtrusive color switcher
